TopicTitle: Please add this sticky to Spacecraft Exchange

Articles.Content:
By popular request, we the regulars of Spacecraft Exchange request that a mod permanently sticky the Master Showcase Thread - the showcase thread to rule them all.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60744-SHOWCASE-SHOWCASE-MASTER-THREAD-All-Your-Showcases-in-One-Place!

I will be happy to maintain it.
